She Manipulates Everyone To Gain Power | Everything She Ever Wanted | Full Thriller Movie | Ann Rule's Everything She Ever Wanted

A sensual, self-assured Southern belle uses her easily influenced young husband - and any other means necessary - to ascend the ranks of Atlanta's elite. | Everything She Ever Wanted is a gripping crime thriller based on the true-crime story from Ann Ruleâ€™s bestselling book. Gina Gershon stars as a cunning Southern belle, determined to rise to Atlantaâ€™s elite by any means necessary.

She manipulates her young husband and those around her, leaving a trail of secrets, betrayal, and deadly ambition. As her schemes unfold, every decision could trigger catastrophic consequences.

Everything She Ever Wanted delivers suspense, intrigue, and psychological drama in a pulse-pounding journey of manipulation, power, and survival where ambition can become deadly.

Stars: Gina Gershon, Rachel Blanchard, Ryan McPartlin
